name: get in the BASEMENT
description:
Created By David McDonald for Ludum Dare 39
Play as a disgruntled employee as you venture down into the basement of your workplace to fix the POWER, when you arrive you notice these creatures coming from the pipework, are they the ones destroying the power?

MOVEMENT = WASD
JUMP/DOUBLE JUMP = Space

There is no read ending to this game as i couldn't compete the full 48 hours, i focused mainly on my first pixel art. Have a quick play :)
